channel.title: Softwares on IID Group
channel.description: Recent content in Softwares on IID Group

item.title: Software
item.description: We highly believe in open and reproducible science. To this end, we try our best to publicly release our software and data sets. Paper Submodular Maximization beyond Non-negativity: Guarantees, Fast Algorithms, and Applications: Code is released here Paper: Streaming Weak Submodularity: Interpreting Neural Networks on the Fly Code is released here. Paper: Probabilistic Submodular Maximization in Sub-Linear Time Code is released here Paper: Differentially Submodular Maximization: Data Summarization in Disguise
